cyclone.name: ANA
cyclone.current_location: about 170 miles SSE of Myrtle Beach, South Carolina
cyclone.trajectory: expected to turn northwest and approach the South Carolina coast over the weekend
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near or just north of Myrtle Beach, SC

port.name: Port of Palm Beach District, FL

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical Storm Watch in effect from Edisto Beach, SC to Cape Lookout, NC
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Georgia, South Carolina and North Carolina coasts; hazardous surf/rip currents along the entire Southeast coast
weather_observation.wind: Breezy conditions possible, but sustained tropical-storm-force winds are unlikely (â‰¤3% probability).
weather_observation.rainfall: Scattered showers possible; heavy tropical rainfall core stays well north of the port.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Elevated swells and rip currents could affect small-craft operations entering or exiting the port channel.
